variable description: The number of attendances for this department type at this organisation for this month.
The number of attendances that breached the four-hour target.
The consent from the end-user to process and share the data collected with the data capture tool.
The index column that allows us to link the data collected to the original ae_attendances data in the 'RawData' folder.
The performance ([1 - breaches]/attendances) calculated for the University Hospitals of Leicester NHS Trust (org_code RWE).
The month that this activity relates to, stored as a date (1st of each month).

notes: other: Other types of A&E/minor injury activity with designated accommodation for the reception of accident and emergency patients.

variable description: The department type for this activity.
notes: 1: Emergency departments are a consultant-led 24-hour service with full resuscitation facilities and designated accommodation for the reception of accident and emergency patients.

2: Consultant-led mono speciality accident and emergency service (e.g. ophthalmology, dental) with designated accommodation for the reception of patients. other: Other types of A&E/minor injury activity with designated accommodation for the reception of accident and emergency patients.
